itunes:summary:
Brandon Herrera aka TheAK47Guy1974 joins the show to talk about producing gun content on YouTube, what he thinks really happened during the JFK assassination, and how he almost became an expert witness in the upcoming Alec Baldwin trial for his accidental shooting on the film 'Rust'.
